body.p: The Gentoo Store now delivers the entire 2004.3 release for the x86 architecture, including all binary packages for all supported subarchitectures (x86, i686, Pentium 3, Pentium 4 and Athlon XP) on a single bootable DVD!
The Gentoo Store also provides a 2-DVD set that contains a complete archive of the 2004.3 release distfiles (all necessary source code, excluding the games category for space reasons).
Part of the store profits go directly to the Gentoo Foundation, helping in establishing the non-for-profit entity, server infrastructure and other Gentoo development related support.
